de.uniulm.omi.cloudiator.sword.api.extensions

Interface PublicIpService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Openstack4JPublicIpService, OpenstackPublicIpService

    public interface PublicIpService
    An interface that handles the assignment of public ips to virtual machines.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String addPublicIp(String virtualMachineId)
      Adds a public ip to the virtual machine.
      void removePublicIp(String virtualMachineId, String address)
      Removes the public ip from the virtual machine.

    • Method Detail

      • addPublicIp

        String addPublicIp(String virtualMachineId)
            throws PublicIpException
        Adds a public ip to the virtual machine.
        Parameters:
        virtualMachineId - the unique identifier for the virtual machine.
        Returns:
        the assigned ip address as string (mandatory).
        Throws:
        PublicIpException - if an error occurs during the assignment of the ip.
        NullPointerException - if the virtualMachineId is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the virtualMachineId is empty.

      • removePublicIp

        void removePublicIp(String virtualMachineId,
                    String address)
             throws PublicIpException
        Removes the public ip from the virtual machine.
        Parameters:
        virtualMachineId - the unique identifier for the virtual machine (mandatory).
        address - the ip address which shall be removed (mandatory).
        Throws:
        PublicIpException - if an error occurs during the de-assignment of the ip.
        NullPointerException - if one of the argument is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if one of the arguments is empty.
